website_summaries.verdict: Good for deadlifts and similar moves, but won't withstand being dropped or thrown, so stick with bar exercises.
pros: Durable thick rubber plate with internal steel ring
Stands up to the elements if used outside
cons: Not intended to withstand being dropped or thrown on the floor
Very flexible when they're the only plates on the bar

customer_reviews.title: at a good price, stop crying about it get to
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with minor external damage, similar to other's posts (see photos). It's nothing major and it does not interfere with use. They're weights, at a good price, stop crying about it get to lifting
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Manufactured - See Photo
customer_reviews.text: I bought a complete set of Titan’s bumper plates. The metal sleeve in the center is not aligned correctly to the rubber molding of the weight. So my plates never line up tight on the bar. The 35lbs plates are embarrassingly crooked. I’m not looking for perfect weights, so I asked the manufacturer to only send me new 35’s instead of a complete new set. I thought this would be extremely fair. They want me to send entire weight set back and for me to pay for the shipping. It wasn’t like an accident happened, they know they shipped out a sub par product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cheap, not so good quality, I'd pay a little more.
customer_reviews.text: If I knew the quality I was buying i would have bought a previous brand I purchased before. I was so pissed when these arrived it looked like someone took a knife to the edges and cut them up, plus some bubbles in the rubber and also separation of the rubber where a seam is. See the photos. **NOTE Some of these images might be from the 25 lb plates also because I purchased 25 and 45 and every plate had marks, cuts, gouges, etc in every one of them. So lame! I didn't want to deal with a return so I'm just not buying from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Roper

customer_reviews.title: The weights bend like a pancake. No stability.
customer_reviews.text: The plates have no stability. When I put them on my bar the weight of the bar bends the plates. No other weight but the bar. Other plates I've used I could add additional weights, but not these. These do no do what I need them too. You can't do any exercises that require the weights on the bar when the bar is required to be on the floor. Also, they stink like rubber and they continue to for a few days now. I could live with that if they were a better product.
customer_reviews.author: oxford,ma

customer_reviews.title: I love it! As good as my Rogue bumpers and such a good value!
customer_reviews.text: These greatly exceeded expectations! They were in great shape from shipping, look awesome, and seem to be of really high quality. They are very lightly coated in an oily substance, probably mold release from the casting of the plate, but it shouldn't be hard to clean up and most lower-middle range bumper plates will have this. I also bought a set of colored Rogue bumper plates because they are so pretty and these were just to be used when I needed to add a ton of weight but now knowing the quality and appearance I would have just bought more of these and saved hundreds of dollars! Seriously, if you're buying bumper plates getting these!!! There is no better value.
customer_reviews.author: Cewing

customer_reviews.title: Great home gym edition
customer_reviews.text: Titan bumper plates were a fraction of what the big name plates cost.. i love crossfit style workouts and incorporate the various well known WOD's into my home training.. what I don't do is drop the bar from head height, nor do I snatch and overhead squat 200 lbs.. If you train at home and want an economical version of what you'd see at your local crossfit, Titan is a good choice
customer_reviews.author: Donald Stilwell

customer_reviews.title: Solid, Pristine, Serve me well. Great Value
customer_reviews.text: These are solid! I purchased them to deadlift at the proper distance off the floor as my 45s were 15.5 inches in diameter (yikes). My 'gym' is in my garage, the smell didn't last a day as far as i knew. They came in plastic bags which probably kept that rubber smell bottled up during shipping and made it worse than it actually is for some people. I don't do clean and jerks and i'm not dropping these from 8 feet off the ground all week so they will hold up great for me and serve my needs perfectly. Great Value for a non-competitive lifter like me just trying to get stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: FALSE ADVERTISING.... DON’T BUY!!!!! READ AND REVIEW COMMENTS FIRST!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: FALSLEY ADVERTISED AS OLYMPIC BUMPER PLATES BUT YOU CANT EVEN DROP THEM FROM ABOVE HEAD LIKE TRUE OLYMPIC BUMPER PLATES. DON’T BUY!!!! NOT WORTH MONEY, I HIGHLY RECOMMEND SPENDING THE EXTRA $20-$40 for the ACTUAL HIGHER BETTER END PRODUCT!!!! I haven’t seen good or some what good results from anyone who has bought these plates. They don’t last and break very very easily. I didn’t even want to give them one star but that is not an option.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly11Fitz

customer_reviews.title: Jump to 15s
customer_reviews.text: If you plan on using these for crossfit WODs or deadlift for that matter don’t even bother with the 10lbs they smush in half when on a 45 lb bar. 15s and above seem to stand for now.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and get the job done
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bumper plates because they were cheap and honestly they are pretty great. You definitely want some type of a platform or rubber under them as the resin that covers them is pretty hard (im using an old rug on top of concrete in my garage & trying my best not to slam them) but overall I think they are great plates for a budget
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product Every Time!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a few bumpers from Titan Fitness, and each time I am surprised at how quickly the products arrive. Always sooner than expected. The package is always pretty beat up too, lol, but to date the product has been undamaged, and they work great. For the price-- I doubt that you can beat the quality. Titan makes the possibility of multifaceted gym a real thing.
customer_reviews.author: Rahz

customer_reviews.title: Warping and coming apart
customer_reviews.text: I've owned these for less than 2 months, and used them maybe 3 times. They're starting to warp out of shape and come apart at the center ring. Not good. I gave them 2 stars because they do weigh 15# (as they should) and can still be used for basic weight I suppose. Will not buy Titan again though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price of these I have no complaints. 10s are a little more flexible then other brands like rogues and can't hold the barbell by themselves. They just kind of bend under the weight. 45lb plates are thicker then normal 45s. But they do seem to have good bounce and haven't seen any signs of damage to the plates or my bar dropping from overhead onto 3/4 inch rubber over concrete.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Made Strong and Durable
customer_reviews.text: You make an excellent bumper plate, very solid! I ordered the 10lb plates thinking they were going to arrive flimsy like several other 10lb plates I have seen at the gym but no not your product it arrived solid made strong and durable I love them! I ordered the 15lbs,10lbs and am about to order the 25lbs from Titan and I will keep ordering from Titan till I have all sets, thank you for making these long lasting quality plates; I also have all your Titan slam balls they are made with the same quality thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: First off they smelled terrible and still do after having them for over a month second when they came they had black tar like substance that I still cant get to stop coming off after cleaning over and over and over again! Its like it didnt harden all the way and its slowly just coming off causing indentions all over. Defiantly worth paying more for a better brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Econo Bumpers for Your Home Gym
customer_reviews.text: These are great buys for folks putting together their first set of home gym bumper plates. Solid training bumpers at a great price. If you are a newbie, get these first to start working on your deadlifts as they are same height as the heavier weights and are thick enough to withstand dropping. Titan really has the best deals on econo line bumpers.
customer_reviews.author: sgrobian

customer_reviews.title: These plates held together beautifully. I don't need pretty plates to throw around ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had 435lbs on the bar with these titan 25s as the focal point for all the weight. My 45lbs are iron and smaller in diameter than these titan bumper plates. These plates held together beautifully. I don't need pretty plates to throw around so they fit my needs just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little crooked but they put weight on the bar
customer_reviews.text: If I had a commercial gym I probably wouldn’t recommend these, but outfitting my home gym, they are a steal for the price. The center of these weights is a little skewed or off to one side so they never sit flush against other weights, but again they are cheap and I can deal with it. It doesn’t really affect how they work or even the amount of weight you can put on, it’s just a bit disconcerting.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Hill

customer_reviews.title: This company is a dumpster fire.
customer_reviews.text: first off I never write reviews but,I wish I could give 0 stars. This is the second consecutive item I received from Titan fitness that was either incomplete or the entire wrong order. I ordered two 25lbs rubber bumper plates. Instead I received 1 45 WTH? That's not even close to the same thing. This is the last item I will every buy from them ever. Their products are inferior to Rogue and cost the same. Save your money buy rogue. They'll get your order right the first time too.
customer_reviews.author: JUAQUIN

customer_reviews.title: cant beat the price, no complaints
customer_reviews.text: The rubber smell is gone after a couple days. The plates are exactly how they should be. Can't beat that price especially with Prime shipping! Makes loading additional plates easier since my other 45# plates have a smaller diameter. Less impact upon lowering weight to the floor is also a nice benefit of these. I might just get another pair for the great price!
customer_reviews.author: Seller_CM

customer_reviews.title: Smooth collar, quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 brands of bumpers. X, Cap and these. These are by and far my favorite. For 1 reason only. Smooth collar. Since most bars have ridges on the sleeve these having a smooth collar are nice. Slide in easy and they are quiet. I have a small home gym and the loud scraping on the others is annoying. They all work as intended.
customer_reviews.author: D L Roach III

customer_reviews.title: Like others mentioned
customer_reviews.text: Like others mentioned, the 10lbs plate will bend if they are used alone on the bar. They do support the bar when secured with barbell clips, even with 10lbs steel plates added to them. To Titan's credit, they did offer to accept a return and pay for the return shipping when I informed them that I was disappointed. But since they support the bar when clipped and I'm never going to "drop" them, it wasn't worth the hassle for me to return it. Also, both plates weighed in at a perfect 10lbs on my digital scale.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They do the job..
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had these for 6 months now and they have held up well. My complaint is the material has a slimey feel to it. We ended up buying from Rogue and the quality was much better and the price wasn’t that much more. Again, nothing majorly wrong with them, but I would def suggest buying Rogue over these for quality (the price isn’t that much more)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Money’s Worth!
customer_reviews.text: Two words...super sturdy. These are probably some of the most solid 10lb bumpers, they don’t bend or turn in when used on their own. The bounce isn’t crazy when you drop the bar from shoulder height. (I’m 5’5). I have no complaints and the initial rubber smell isn’t too strong and wears off quickly when left in the garage overnight. Shipping also came earlier than expected which was a plus. I have an Olympic sized bar and had no issues with the fit (2-inch collars). Definitely will be purchasing a few more to have on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Better price for a high quality bumper plate
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Affordable and high quality bumper plates for my garage gym. Don’t spend extra money getting the thin Olympic style bumpers when you aren’t deadlifting more than 400lbs or look like Ronnie Coleman. These do great, they drop good on my rubber matting and I can fit plenty more on the bar. Thanks Titan Fitness... now please keep your products cheaper than competitors and I’ll come back for more
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent set for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Weights are weights. These aren’t the best quality I’ve ever used but who cares, why spend more money when you can get the same bang for less cash. Only negative is the 10lb plates are flimsy but they still work just fine. They arrived oily but a quick wipe down and you’re off to the races.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Grubb

customer_reviews.title: Is a Go Go!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Better the Rogue plate when we talk about quality, my rogue plates bend the small ones this one don’t bend at all!!!! Waiting for them to stock more platea so I can get more from them. Also there price is way better.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Fantauzzi

customer_reviews.title: Worth the lift to purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and in excellent perfect condition. They are working great! There is a slight greasy residue that you will have to wipe off (or not). I used warm dish washing soap. This also helped to eliminate that new rubber smell a bit. Otherwise I am happy with my plates and would order this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Sungirl

customer_reviews.title: So what they smell
customer_reviews.text: Yes the scent is pretty bad, but after opening, I just left them outdoors to air out. They are perfect for my Olympic squat bar and an addition to my gym equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Cheap.  Very similar to my other dead drop bumpers.
customer_reviews.text: Good price to quailty ratio. My scale says they are within 1.6 oz of 10lbs. Some reviews imply that these are flimsy. They seem typical of 10lb bumper plates. A 10kg or 15kg bar sporting only a pair of 10lb bumper plates should not be dropped. This is true for all brands. Look at the warranty for other brand 10lb bumpers. They don't last very long if you are dropping them.
customer_reviews.author: timothy kenny

customer_reviews.title: Appear to be of good quality, but did't fit
customer_reviews.text: I have a standard 45 pound Olympic bar. These did not fit, at all, could not even be coaxed the center hole was too small. This was disappointing as the price was certainly right and they seem to be of good quality. I am processing a refund now, we will se how this goes.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie B. Gulden

customer_reviews.title: Scent?
customer_reviews.text: I could only give four stars for scent. However, in every other respect these bumper plates are a five star product.
customer_reviews.author: DEM

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, very quick shipping
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of the 45 lb bumper plates from Titan. I’d previously purchased two of the same size from Rage, but bought these because they were cheaper. These arrived in a day! The rage came in after about 10 days. The quality is comparable. I have no issues with either.
customer_reviews.author: TALewellen

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Plates look and feel great. Be careful if you're using these as your only bumpers for heavy deadlifts. They can bend. Currently use them for 255lbs and they work alright but I think that's about their limit
customer_reviews.author: Logan French

customer_reviews.title: Minor cosmic blemishes
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars due to some minor blemishes but other then that absolutely satisfied with the performance of them. Only recommendation to Titan fitness is look into better machining or molding of the rubber.
customer_reviews.author: Buzz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality. Perfect For Practicing Form.
customer_reviews.text: These are well built and perfect for practicing dead lift form before you go slapping those 45s on the bar. I use them on a 3/4" thick gym mat and don't slam or drop my weights so there has never been an issue. Also a great add-on if you don't feel like looking around for a 10 and a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Shreddr

customer_reviews.title: great bumper plates
customer_reviews.text: bought these for my fiance as a birthday present and they're just as expected. haven't had any problems with them, and actually have a set of the 15 lb plates as well. love them!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: These have a smell but nothing too crazy. Price was right and they look good. A bit of warping when they showed up. Not the best but a good value purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Just received it ... Not sure yet
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had time to evaluate it yet ... but on the first inspection ... there was a strange film on the plates. They are noticeably thinner than my other brands for the same size weight they do fit will on the weight pegs ... so we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: B. D. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: My husband purchased these to use with his at-home gym. He has started doing different workouts recently and these weights have allowed him to start at a lighter weight, while still being the same height as heavier rubber weights.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Wathen

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t bother buying Rogue when you can buy these and they work fantastic!!! Smooth rubber, low smell, durable. Survived many oly lifting overhead drops.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Solid, just check for tears.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a pair of 45's to take to my gym because they only have hex plates. These are competition height, so they get the hex plates off the ground so you can roll the bar. My plates came quickly, but one had a small tear in the rubber. They had a replacement to me within a few days. Now I've got two solid bumpers that I am more than happy with. Deadlifting in the 500s gives these plates no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have absolute no complaints about these bumper plates. These work perfect for my at home crossfit workouts. I drop the bar sometimes, But I try to be self aware since I don't have a rubber floor mat.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie strothkamp

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts / Poor Customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have read more reviews before purchasing items from Titan fitness. several complaints on incorrect or missing parts being shipped. While the equipment was of decent quality for a home gym setup the customer service is the worst. I Strongly recommend saving your time and ordering from another manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Not designed to be dropped from overhead.
customer_reviews.text: Wish they could be dropped but it’s not a big deal. Great value for budget bumper plates. I own all Titan Fitness bumpers and a Titan Fitness technique barbell.
customer_reviews.author: cgz

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great plates for the money, I'm still waiting to see how long they last.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. No issues on receipt. Relatively easy installation. Great product. Absolutely amazing customer service...their help is the way it should be for all companies. I ordered this, along with several accompanying pieces of equipment. Inadvertently ordered two Olympic bars, they emailed a return label with no questions. Great experience all around. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality and durability at an awesome price.!
customer_reviews.text: These Titan fitness bumper plates are awesome and tough, and you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: tony fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm just so happy with these! Perfect for CrossFit or regular bench work. Super high quality, good materials and they arrived quickly too.
customer_reviews.author: A B Stone

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with them
customer_reviews.text: I recieved a pair with no issues or cosmetic damage. Extremely happy with them. I was a little worried because of the bad reviews, but I won't be slamming these around like a lunatic so I dont think I'll have any problems. Also they arrived before they were scheduled to be here!
customer_reviews.author: Tini

customer_reviews.title: Quality bumpers. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I don't take time to write reviews very often, but I wanted to make sure others know about the good quality of these bumper plates. There are no gouges, no offset inserts, and no lumps or bubbles in the rubber. The plates are what I would expect to find in a quality gym. I also have some 25 lb plates from Titan and an axle bar. All their products are excellent and the prices are very competitive. I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Nobeard

customer_reviews.title: High Quality i've come to expect from titan bumpers
customer_reviews.text: This bumper plates are a great addition for my home gym use. The quality is good. Titan offers regular sales on these plates, so I've purchased more plates as my strength increases. The price is good and the weight is just right. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: White Guard

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: Boxes were utterly destroyed upon arrival (its the City of Chicago, so I wasnt expecting anything different), but the plates were in perfect shape. Theyre just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: NoneOfYourBeesWax

customer_reviews.title: Solid so far
customer_reviews.text: I just received it in last week or so, but so far they look great and the price was the lowest 45 on bumper plate on the market. Will update as they age to let you know how they hold up. Giving 4 stars as I need to put some stress on them before I add the 5th star.
customer_reviews.author: Rita W.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used numerous brands of bumpers and plates and I’ll say that titan is the best bang for your buck $$$. There are other brands that are close or cheaper in price but this is the best quality for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Spriggs

customer_reviews.title: Not as oily great value
customer_reviews.text: Not as oily as most bumper plates. A Great value
customer_reviews.author: none

customer_reviews.title: I love my recent purchase of these bumper plates
customer_reviews.text: I love my recent purchase of these bumper plates! Awesome for practicing my Lifts I learned during my Crossfit Classes. Great addition to my steel weight set!
customer_reviews.author: Shelva Jean Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I have only used them in three workouts and do ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only used them in three workouts and do not slam or drop them from overhead lifting, as they are not designed for this, and have found them to be exactly what I expected when I purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: Tarheel Barry

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars based on the value for the cost of ...
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars based on the value for the cost of what I paid. This is my first bumper plates of any kind, and they can be kinda pricey, these were much less costly. I needed these for the diameter of the plates for some equipment I built.
customer_reviews.author: William M.

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great product
customer_reviews.text: Great price and great product. As they mention, you can't use them on their own if you are deadlifting or any other lift that has them hitting the floor. But they work well when used in combination with thicker plates. Might have to buy another pair at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Ayak

customer_reviews.title: I didn't get any manufacturing imperfections like other have mentioned and the rubber smell didn't last ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price of these, I can't complain a bit! I didn't get any manufacturing imperfections like other have mentioned and the rubber smell didn't last but maybe a day. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Kenny M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is the only place I will buy bumpers from. Excellent quality and so much more affordable than the name brands.
customer_reviews.author: MCMXXVII

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: These plates actually bent under the weight of the bar. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Elly

customer_reviews.title: Solid but probably won't hold up long term
customer_reviews.text: Solid weights for the money, but I question the long term durability. My rogue plates are 2 years older and the titans are already showing more wear and tear after just a few months. However, you do get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Nice, solid weights.
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the plates. Yes, they did come with a oily film on them but I wiped them off with some Goo Gone wipes and they are perfectly fine. They are working out just fine. Plan on ordering more of them because of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems great to me
customer_reviews.text: I drop these from knee height twice a week. Hasn't cracked in about 6 months. Seems great to me.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Yang

customer_reviews.title: Good at price
customer_reviews.text: Great price nice item perfect for home gym. If your not crossfit chucking weigts around or slaming weights down on heavy deads I would imagine these will last me a life time
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Bought these so my wife who is starting to lift ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these so my wife who is starting to lift can learn to dead lift with proper form. Starting with normal 35 or 45 lb plates was too much weight for her 115 lbs of body to handle and she had to reach to far when using smaller plates.
customer_reviews.author: Crater

customer_reviews.title: Amazing budget bumper plates
customer_reviews.text: I love these bumper plates. Cheap and perfect for my outdoor home gym. They've handled almost a full year in the Arizona sun and "elements" here.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: The fit and finish is pretty good and the price was fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Bruce

customer_reviews.title: No problems
customer_reviews.text: Came in and showed no signs of wear or any cuts like mentioned in other reviews. Good product so far
customer_reviews.author: crosby23

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and well made.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for my son who loves it. It's true the seams aren't perfectly cleaned, but everything else works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Coconut

customer_reviews.title: I like them
customer_reviews.text: These are a great price and just what I was looking for. They do have a slight odor, so just to be warned. But definitely great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Solid bumpers at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking bumpers, solid. Bought them because our gym is closed because of the corona virus. Looking forward to some living room snatches, and social distanced overhead squats across the parking lot.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Ekstrom

customer_reviews.title: Titian has quality stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great bumpers to help with padding the drops on deadlifts.
customer_reviews.author: Don Markham

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price for 45# bumper plates
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price for 45# bumper plates. Arrived very quickly from MS to CA and with no damage. No issues so far after several weeks of use. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: but they are good quality for their intended purpose
customer_reviews.text: They do the job theyre supposed to and are exactly as advertised. There’s nothing fancy about these plates, but they are good quality for their intended purpose. They should hold up just fine if you don’t abuse them. These 10lb plates are not intended to be used by themselves. They’re too thin and will not maintain form if used without a heavier plate to go with them, but that is to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Sparrow

customer_reviews.title: Work as described. The issue is when working out ...
customer_reviews.text: Work as described. The issue is when working out with just these on a bar they bend, you could never drop the bar with just these on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid bumpers and a great price! They were a little warped
customer_reviews.text: Solid bumpers and a great price! They were a little warped, compared to the 25's I got but not noticeable to make a difference. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny M.

customer_reviews.title: Solid rubber plates
customer_reviews.text: Great stand alone plates. Very durable when dropped multiple times during WOD. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mateo Salado

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Little pricey but they work and can be used for CrossFit and weight training
customer_reviews.author: Stephen P

customer_reviews.title: some blemishes
customer_reviews.text: Pretty stinky with some bumps in the rubber. Not smooth throughout as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Washington

customer_reviews.title: This is the product to buy before spending money on ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the product to buy before spending money on plates with a famous name on them for your vanity home gym.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey evans

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set of these plates and I could not be happier. The quality and price along with free prime shipping is incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Like paper but covered in grease
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Spend a few more dollars and get rogue fitness bumpers.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: great addition to my weight set
customer_reviews.text: As the manufacturer advises, don't use them alone ! I only use them along with other weights and have no problems.
customer_reviews.author: turbovelocity

customer_reviews.title: Great bumper weight - now I can adjust the increment ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bumper weight - now I can adjust the increment much better with these. Only complain is it has grease all over it ! - Just wipe it clean !
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: price was right, shipping was as projected
customer_reviews.text: works for me. what else can I ask bumper plates to do?
customer_reviews.author: bill m. barron terrific book

customer_reviews.title: no brainer..
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, without blemishes.2 inch holes with metal alloy inserts, to last a lifetime. would definitely purchase again and from this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: cnnmbrph

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Would have preferred something a little more rigid, but for the price, these get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Mason E L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Titan is THE best gym gear ever. I've built most of my gym with them and I'm very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good value & made well
customer_reviews.text: Good value and well made! I will purchase again in future.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G. Spaulding

customer_reviews.title: Good price.
customer_reviews.text: I was really happy with these plates. I bought 2. They were half the price of most others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tuff weights
customer_reviews.text: I have not been easy on these weighs, and they show no sign of quitting anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: turbovelocity

customer_reviews.title: Nice plates
customer_reviews.text: Durable, solid construction. Will see if they hold up over time. Arrived quickly and packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Put on the 45s did a clean and press, dropped them from chest high. Didn't bounce all crazy. I might be an amateur lifter but these are professional weights. I would had paid more.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good plates. Just started using them, so can't speak for durability, but they seem like a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Gorin

customer_reviews.title: they look good.
customer_reviews.text: They are exactly what they say they are "Bench Press Plates". Not to be mistaken for stand alone plates that one would use for a lift from the ground. They can not support the weight of an Olympic bar by themselves (men's or a women's bar). That being said, they look good.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Tremaine

customer_reviews.title: Good plate for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can't beat them. Little harder rubber plate than more expensive ones but you deal with it.
customer_reviews.author: erick cochran

customer_reviews.title: Solid Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Rec'd the wrong item first time around. Once I got them though they performed as expected. Solid purchase.
customer_reviews.author: WilliW

product_meta.title: TITAN Fitness Black Bumper Plates
feature_bullets: Versatility: Fits any Olympic bar with diameter 2” or less; Can be used with 2” dumbbell bars
Dimensions: Inner ring diameter – 2”; Total diameter – 17 3/4”; Height - 1 3/8"
Quality design: Thick rubber plate is very durable; Steel internal ring is heavy duty and maintains shape
Included: This includes 2 15 lb weighted bumper plates
Also available: Check our other listings for plates of different sizes and colors, Olympic bars, and storage trees
